languages.text: "Мой брат когда-то был Главным технопровидцем на сем корабле". {n}Асклепий делает жест рукой, благоговейно обводя вокруг.{/n} "И последователем учения Прерывания Цикла, как и я".
"My brother once served as the Enginseer Prime on this ship." {n}Asclepius gestures around him reverently.{/n} "He was an adherent of the school of Discontinuing the Cycle, as am I."
languages.original_text: "Мой брат когда-то был Главным технопровидцем на сем корабле". {n}Асклепий делает жест рукой, благоговейно обводя вокруг.{/n} "И последователем учения Прерывания Цикла, как и я".

traits.locale_text: "My brother once served as the Chief Enginseer on this ship." {n}Asclepius gestures around him reverently.{/n} "He was an adherent of the school of Discontinuing the Cycle, as am I."
"My brother once served as the Chief Enginseer on this ship." {n}Asclepius gestures around him reverently.{/n} "He was an adherent of the school of Discontinuing the Cycle, as am I."
"My brother once served as the Enginseer Prime on this ship." {n}Asclepius gestures around him reverently.{/n} "He was an adherent of the school of Discontinuing the Cycle, as am I."
"My brother once served as the Enginseer Prime on this ship." {n}Asclepius gestures around him reverently.{/n} "He was an adherent of the school of Discontinuing the Cycle, as am I."
"My brother once served as the Enginseer Prime on this ship." {n}Asclepius gestures around him reverently.{/n} "He was an adherent of the school of Discontinuing the Cycle, as am I."

languages.text: 「私の兄弟はかつてこの船の主任旗艦整備師だった」{n}アスクレピオスは恭しい仕草で彼の周りを示した。{/n}「彼も私と同じく円環断絶の学徒だった」
languages.original_text: "My brother once served as the Enginseer Prime on this ship." {n}Asclepius gestures around him reverently.{/n} "He was an adherent of the school of Discontinuing the Cycle, as am I."

traits.locale_text: 「私の兄弟はかつてこの船の主任旗艦整備師だった」{n}アスクレピオスは恭しい仕草で彼の周りを示した。{/n}「彼も私と同じく円環断絶の学徒だった」

languages.text: “我的兄弟曾经是这艘船上的主引擎先知。”{n}阿斯克勒庇俄斯恭敬地向周围做了个手势。{/n}“他和我一样，是终止循环学派的拥护者。”
languages.original_text: "My brother once served as the Enginseer Prime on this ship." {n}Asclepius gestures around him reverently.{/n} "He was an adherent of the school of Discontinuing the Cycle, as am I."

traits.locale_text: “我的兄弟曾经是这艘船上的主引擎先知。”{n}阿斯克勒庇俄斯恭敬地向周围做了个手势。{/n}“他和我一样，是终止循环学派的拥护者。”

languages.text: "Mein Bruder hat einmal als Maschinenseher Primus auf diesem Schiff gedient." {n}Asclepius führt eine ehrfürchtige Geste aus, die das gesamte Schiff umfasst.{/n} "Er war Anhänger der Schule der Unterbrechung des Kreislaufs, genau wie ich."
languages.original_text: "My brother once served as the Enginseer Prime on this ship." {n}Asclepius gestures around him reverently.{/n} "He was an adherent of the school of Discontinuing the Cycle, as am I."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Bruder hat einmal als Maschinenseher Primus auf diesem Schiff gedient." {n}Asclepius führt eine ehrfürchtige Geste aus, die das gesamte Schiff umfasst.{/n} "Er war Anhänger der Schule der Unterbrechung des Kreislaufs, genau wie ich."

languages.text: « Mon frère était autrefois technaugure primus sur ce vaisseau, {n}déclare Asclépios en faisant un geste révérencieux autour de lui.{/n} Il était adepte de l'école de l'Interruption du Cycle, tout comme moi. »
languages.original_text: "My brother once served as the Enginseer Prime on this ship." {n}Asclepius gestures around him reverently.{/n} "He was an adherent of the school of Discontinuing the Cycle, as am I."

traits.locale_text: « Mon frère était autrefois technaugure primus sur ce vaisseau, {n}déclare Asclépios en faisant un geste révérencieux autour de lui.{/n} Il était adepte de l'école de l'interruption du cycle, tout comme moi. »

languages.text: «Mi hermano sirvió como visioingeniero primero de esta nave». {n}Asclepius señala a su alrededor con un ademán de reverencia.{/n} «Era partidario de la escuela de pensamiento que aboga por interrumpir el Ciclo, igual que yo».
languages.original_text: "My brother once served as the Enginseer Prime on this ship." {n}Asclepius gestures around him reverently.{/n} "He was an adherent of the school of Discontinuing the Cycle, as am I."

traits.locale_text: «Mi hermano sirvió como visioingeniero primero de esta nave». {n}Asclepius señala a su alrededor con un ademán de reverencia.{/n} «Era partidario de la escuela de pensamiento que aboga por interrumpir el Ciclo, igual que yo».

languages.text: "Kardeşim zamanında bu gemide Başmühedyum olarak görev yaptı." {n}Asclepius, hürmetkâr bir şekilde etrafını gösteriyor.{/n} "Döngü Süreğinin Bozulumu ekolünün taraftarlarından biriydi... Tıpkı benim gibi."
languages.original_text: "My brother once served as the Enginseer Prime on this ship." {n}Asclepius gestures around him reverently.{/n} "He was an adherent of the school of Discontinuing the Cycle, as am I."

traits.locale_text: "Kardeşim zamanında bu gemide Başmühedyum olarak görev yaptı." {n}Asclepius, hürmetkâr bir şekilde etrafını gösteriyor.{/n} "Döngü'nün Süreğini Bozma ekolünün taraftarlarından biriydi... Tıpkı benim gibi."
